articles.title: How old is Natalia Grace REALLY? Legal expert calls for case to be revisited - Daily Mail
articles.description: Beth Karas (pictured) has sensationally cast doubt over the legal ruling that increased Natalia Barnett's age by 14 years in 2012, arguing that the process used by a judge was dubious at best.
articles.content:
A legal expert has sensationally called for the complex case of Natalia Grace Barnett's true age to be revisited amid a slew of unanswered questions. 
Beth Karas, an attorney and former prosecutor, … [+8523 chars]
